# lux-text

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description        | Type                                                                     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Text color variant | `"default" \| "error" \| "muted" \| "primary" \| "success" \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Text size          | `"base" \| "lg" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs" \| undefined`                    | `undefined` |
| `weight` | `weight`  | Font weight        | `"bold" \| "medium" \| "normal" \| "semibold" \| undefined`              | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description  |
| ---- | ------------ |
|      | Text content |
